dude, you know he is toxic before this right? then why share an account if you know you're at the risk of your account being banned, you made the choice to let him play, its like someone makes a bomb, then gives it to terrorists, when they use it he says "its not my fault, its the terrorists, they set off the bomb" it is still his fault though because he gave them the bomb in the first place.

Essentially, it isn't you personally that is banned. It's the account itself that has been banned. [**Account sharing is not allowed**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) since you can start an account of your own for free, so you are responsible for everything your account does. I'd encourage your friend to start his own account, that way you won't need to be held responsible for anything they do.
